List of school and colleague

Here are the list of places that i attend to get education from school to university :

  • SDIT Persis Tarogong Kidul

    SDIT Persis Tarogong Kidul is my primary school, i spent 6 years in this school getting basic education like reading, writing, counting, and how to operate computer

  • SMPN 1 Garut

    i spent 3 years in middle school to broaden my knowledge. this is where i started to learn more about math, biology, and technology

  • SMAN 15 Garut

    i spent another 3 years in high school to learn even more in order to advance my knowledge. The school sometimes gave too much homework where i got overwhelmed many times, but thankfull i have quite lots of friends where we usually help each other out. Here is where i started to get interested in making a website

  • Universitas Teknologi Yogyakarta

    This is where i'm currently studying after graduate from high school, here they teach how to develop not just a website but also how to make a mobile app, Artificial Reality, and how to process big data(although i very bad at this one)

Portofolio

Since i enter colleague and start learning how to code, i sometimes create a small project such as making a form that can send data through API, experimenting with inputs and data types, and showing data from API in a table or a lists.

But so far projects that i could call finish and ready to deplop are only 2 so far, which is this blog and my first reactJS project HooBank Yoga.
